name: Remove Marketplace Suggestions for WooCommerce
author: Lawrie Malen

sections.description:
WooCommerce’s inclusion of Marketplace Suggestions is one of the more unpopular additions coming in WooCommerce 3.6. Suggestions for other plugins to buy can crop up constantly when viewing product lists, creating & editing products and in other places. They will crop up daily and return unbidden after a month – even if you dismiss them. The purpose of this short n’ sweet plugin is to banish them entirely.

For web developers & seasoned programmers it can be straightforward to add a filter to mitigate this; but for people who aren’t comfortable with editing their site’s code, or don’t have the access or opportunity to do so, this plugin will take care of it for you.

How does it work?

Simple – just install the plugin & bam! – you’re done. No setup, no extra configuration.
sections.installation: Simply install the plugin and bam! – you’re done.
